name: Farmer vs Aliens
description:
FARMER vs ALIENS (early access)

The aliens look hungry and crazy about our farmer's beloved cow.
Grab your weapons, defend the farm and also cause some explosions!
-
Farmer vs Aliens is a platform game in which the player must help his farmer to protect his fluffy cows against the waves of attack of the hungry aliens!

--

Help me to make this game better!
